comment: Dr. Goldfine is the bomb! I took her my first semester at KSU and she was awesome! I'm terrible at writing (math major) but she is very clear in what she expects.

This class was supposed to be an easy A but turned out to be one of the hardest classes I had during the semester (harder than chemistry). She assigned so many pointless assignments and the tests were awful. She is a genuinely nice lady but took the class way too seriously.

Although she is really nice this class has so much busy work. There is always something due and she has about 5 different pages to look at and see what you need done. It was supposed to be an easy A but it really wasn't. You pretty much have to memorize the whole book for the test.

Terrible professor. Everyone I talked to about this class said it should be easy and informative. Instead of being useful, it's causing me to fail! It's not possible to take 4 other classes and this one and do well... especially if you're working on top of all that. Avoid at all costs!
EXTREMELY helpful! The material is common sense but you should still study for the tests. Come to class and you will get an easy A.

The material was common sense. When it comes time for Test you will be so use to the common sense stuff you won't feel the need to study and but she'll put random facts off the wall facts on there. So study no matter how easy it seems.
Great professor. Very nice. EXTREMELY helpful. My favorite professor BY FAR.

Awesome professor.I took her hybrid course.However there are a lot of assignments but they are easy.Mostly 10pt online quizzes.As for required book, no test just discussion boards which are easier.At the end there is a career paper & presentation. Easy class if u keep track of deadlines otherwise it will be difficult.Also offers lots extra credit.

She is an awful professor. this class was suppose to be super easy, but I was busier in her class than in all of my other classes combined and I am a biology major. You have to write a one page paper at least once a week and she makes you do a bunch of pointless assignments, that you have most likely already done in high school. Not an easy A class
Great teacher. Horrible class.

Absolutely one of the worst professors to have for this class. If you enjoy writing essays then go ahead. at least 7 essays throughout semester. Along with other pointless work that is assigned. She wrote the first 2 chapters in the book therefore this class is her life. Definitely would not recommend taking her along with other tough courses.
Sweetest teacher ever, and extremely helpful! Only 3 essays the entire semester. Let's you redo your lowest essay.
Mrs. Goldfine is great. super easy material and very helpful. She's got some awesome stories and her class is never dull. I see her at Town Center mall all the time. Take her!!!
Easy grade.
Goldfish is the BEST! Love seeing her on campus when not in her class. She is so helpful with ANYTHING involving KSU take her if you have the chance! Good readings and interesting topics.
i LOVE htis class and Mrs. Goldfine is THE BEST!!!!!!!!

Dr. Goldfine is a FANTASTIC teacher! She's extremely helpful and knows exactly what she's teaching and how to teach it. She is pretty laid back and really easy to talk to and get along with. I HIGHLY recommend her!!!

She is amazing! Not only is she super helpful and fun, but she is really laid back and is willing to push back dates if needed. Also... she got me my babysitting job, so she is helpful out side of school work too! Wonderful lady. :)

Very sweet lady! Will help you out when you don't understand. Attendance is part of your grade, so you have to go to class. It's mostly quizzes and papers, no tests. The quizzes are open book, on VISTA. They're easy. Love her!!! Definitely recommend her.
greatest teacher ever!!loved her.she never penalised stuff, was always willing to work with us and class was very effortless
Totally awesome.
Loved her she is very helpful and will work with you to make sure you understand. You will work hard but you will learn.
She is pretty much awesome.

Sweet lady! You do have to go to class, there is an attendance policy. A lot of outside work, no tests. You do have to actually do the work. It's mainly quizzes on books you read, they're not hard. KSU 1101 is not a fun class, but you have to take it, I would recommend her.
No Comments
She gives alot of assignments and grades them mostly for effort, so at least attempt the work. She's a fair grader, I made an A! And she is soo nice,always willing to help and very understanding.
Wonderful teacher, take her class if at all possible, she does require you to work and she will help you if you need help, make sure you go and talk to her and you'll do fine in her class
Best teacher for new freshmen students.  She will help you with ANYTHING...not just english. Sweet as can be and she helped me SOOOO much with my writing:-)

Dr. Goldfine is one of the most helpful professors I have ever had.  She is willing to spend time helping you!! Her class is in no way hard and very interresting.  She lets you correct your papers and doesn't give any test.  I wish that she taught more than just learning communities!! Thanks!!!
Mrs. Goldfine is a great teacher. She enjoys teaching. Pay attention, ask for help when needed, and do the little bit of work she asks of you. However, she does take roll.
